text: The 2019 Baltimore Brigade season was the third season for the Baltimore Brigade in the Arena Football League. The Brigade played at the Royal Farms Arena and were coached by Omarr Smith for the 2019 season. ==Standings== ==Schedule== ===Regular season=== The 2019 regular season schedule was released on February 13, 2019.
